remarks: A subring of the base ring induces a subring of power series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrgpsr.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
subrgpsr.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgpsr.u $e |- U = ( I mPwSer H ) $.
subrgpsr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
subrgpsr $p |- ( ( I e. V /\ T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> B e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
